verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* Eliphaz \w the|strong="H6030"\w* \w Temanite|strong="H8489"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*,

“\w Can|strong="H1397"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w be|strong="H1397"\w* \w profitable|strong="H5532"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God? \w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H1397"\w* \w is|strong="H1397"\w* \w wise|strong="H7919"\w* \w is|strong="H1397"\w* \w profitable|strong="H5532"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w himself|strong="H7919"\w*.

\w Is|strong="H1870"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H3588"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w* \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1870"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6663"\w*? \w Or|strong="H1870"\w* does \w it|strong="H3588"\w* benefit \w him|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H8552"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w perfect|strong="H8552"\w*?

\w Is|strong="H4941"\w* \w it|strong="H4941"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w your|strong="H5973"\w* \w piety|strong="H3374"\w* that he \w reproves|strong="H3198"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w*, that he enters \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w into|strong="H4941"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*?

Isn’t \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w*? \w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H5771"\w* there \w any|strong="H3808"\w* \w end|strong="H7093"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w taken|strong="H2254"\w* \w pledges|strong="H2254"\w* from \w your|strong="H3588"\w* brother \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w nothing|strong="H2600"\w*, \w and|strong="H6174"\w* \w stripped|strong="H6584"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w naked|strong="H6174"\w* of \w their|strong="H3588"\w* clothing.

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* haven’t \w given|strong="H8248"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H8248"\w* \w weary|strong="H5889"\w* \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w withheld|strong="H4513"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w from|strong="H3899"\w* \w the|strong="H8248"\w* \w hungry|strong="H7456"\w*.

But \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w mighty|strong="H2220"\w* \w man|strong="H5375"\w*, \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w had|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth. \w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w honorable|strong="H5375"\w* \w man|strong="H5375"\w*, \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w You|strong="H7971"\w* \w have|strong="H2220"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* widows \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w empty|strong="H7387"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w arms|strong="H2220"\w* \w of|strong="H2220"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w* \w have|strong="H2220"\w* been \w broken|strong="H1792"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w snares|strong="H6341"\w* \w are|strong="H6341"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Sudden|strong="H6597"\w* \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* troubles \w you|strong="H5921"\w*,

\w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w can|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* floods \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*.

“Isn’t \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w heights|strong="H7311"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*? \w See|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w height|strong="H1363"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w stars|strong="H3556"\w*, \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w high|strong="H7311"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w*!

\w You|strong="H3045"\w* say, ‘\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w does|strong="H4100"\w* God \w know|strong="H3045"\w*? \w Can|strong="H4100"\w* \w he|strong="H3045"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w through|strong="H1157"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w thick|strong="H6205"\w* \w darkness|strong="H6205"\w*?

\w Thick|strong="H5645"\w* \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covering|strong="H5643"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w so|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* doesn’t \w see|strong="H7200"\w*. \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w walks|strong="H1980"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w vault|strong="H2329"\w* \w of|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w sky|strong="H8064"\w*.’

\w Will|strong="H4962"\w* \w you|strong="H8104"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w old|strong="H5769"\w* way, which wicked \w men|strong="H4962"\w* \w have|strong="H4962"\w* \w trodden|strong="H1869"\w*,

\w who|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H3247"\w* \w snatched|strong="H7059"\w* \w away|strong="H3332"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w whose|strong="H5104"\w* \w foundation|strong="H3247"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w poured|strong="H3332"\w* \w out|strong="H3332"\w* \w as|strong="H6256"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w stream|strong="H5104"\w*,

\w who|strong="H4100"\w* said \w to|strong="H4480"\w* God, ‘\w Depart|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H4480"\w*!’ \w and|strong="H5493"\w*, ‘\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w do|strong="H6466"\w* \w for|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H4480"\w*?’

Yet \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w their|strong="H4390"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w things|strong="H2896"\w*, \w but|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w are|strong="H6662"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*. \w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* ridicule \w them|strong="H7200"\w*,

saying, ‘\w Surely|strong="H3808"\w* those \w who|strong="H3808"\w* rose up against us \w are|strong="H7009"\w* \w cut|strong="H3582"\w* \w off|strong="H3582"\w*. \w The|strong="H3808"\w* fire has consumed \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w remnant|strong="H3499"\w*.’

“\w Acquaint|strong="H5532"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5973"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w*, \w and|strong="H2896"\w* \w be|strong="H4994"\w* \w at|strong="H5973"\w* \w peace|strong="H7999"\w*. \w By|strong="H5973"\w* \w it|strong="H7999"\w*, \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w will|strong="H2896"\w* \w come|strong="H4994"\w* \w to|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w instruction|strong="H8451"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w words|strong="H6310"\w* \w in|strong="H6310"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

If \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w up|strong="H1129"\w*, if \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w put|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w unrighteousness|strong="H5766"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* tents.

\w Lay|strong="H7896"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* treasure \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w gold|strong="H1220"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Ophir \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w stones|strong="H6697"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w brooks|strong="H5158"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1961"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* treasure, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* precious \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w then|strong="H5375"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w delight|strong="H6026"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God.

\w You|strong="H7999"\w* \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w make|strong="H7999"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* \w prayer|strong="H6279"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* he \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H7999"\w*. \w You|strong="H7999"\w* \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1870"\w* also \w decree|strong="H1504"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thing, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1870"\w* \w be|strong="H1870"\w* \w established|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Light|strong="H5050"\w* \w will|strong="H1870"\w* \w shine|strong="H5050"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w cast|strong="H8213"\w* \w down|strong="H8213"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* say, ‘\w be|strong="H5869"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H1466"\w*.’ \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w humble|strong="H7807"\w* \w person|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3709"\w* \w will|strong="H5355"\w* even \w deliver|strong="H4422"\w* \w him|strong="H4422"\w* who \w is|strong="H3709"\w* not \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w*. Yes, \w he|strong="H3709"\w* \w will|strong="H5355"\w* be \w delivered|strong="H4422"\w* through \w the|strong="H4422"\w* \w cleanness|strong="H1252"\w* \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w your|strong="H4422"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*.”
